Class FileSystemTree

    • FileSystemTree
  • public class FileSystemTree
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected static class  FileSystemTree.FileNode
      this class is used to store the file or the directory of the instances of FIleSystemTree

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private FileSystemTree.FileNode root
      holds the root directory of this FileSystemTree

      calls private printFileSystem that is contained within the FileNode

      private method that executes the desired functionality
      private void remove​(java.lang.String file, FileSystemTree.FileNode node)
      helper method that is exectued when the desired path is reached, it will give the opportunity to remove the right file if it's name has been misspelled

      private helper method used for searching
      void search​(java.lang.String str)
      method to search the entire file system for a directory or a file including the given search characters in its name.

        returns true if directory is added and false otherwise
        Parameters:

        returns true if directory is added and false otherwise

        public boolean addFile​(java.lang.String path)
        returns true if the file is added and false otherwise
        Parameters:
        path - path to the element to be added
        Returns:
        true if the file is added and false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - when path passed is null

      • printFileSystem

        public void printFileSystem()
        calls private printFileSystem that is contained within the FileNode

      • search

        public void search​(java.lang.String str)
        method to search the entire file system for a directory or a file including the given search characters in its name. The search characters will be given as the parameter of the method
        Parameters:
        str - characters to be searched for

      • search

        private void search​(FileSystemTree.FileNode temp,
                    java.lang.String str,
                    java.lang.String path)
        private helper method used for searching
        Parameters:
        temp - current file node
        str - characters to be serached for
        path - string to be output at the momemnt found( being appended at every step

      • remove

        public void remove​(java.lang.String path)
        removes the element given the desired path
        Parameters:
        path - path of the file to be removed
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - when null is passed as a paramter

      • remove

        private void remove​(java.lang.String[] path,
                    FileSystemTree.FileNode root_node)
        private method that executes the desired functionality
        Parameters:
        path - path of the element to be removed
        root_node - root node of the file system from which the file/directory is to be removed

      • remove

        private void remove​(java.lang.String file,
                    FileSystemTree.FileNode node)
        helper method that is exectued when the desired path is reached, it will give the opportunity to remove the right file if it's name has been misspelled
        Parameters:
        file - name of the file to be removed
        node - node of FileNode structure that should contain this file/directory
